name: Just Shoot: 100 Rooms to Kill
description:
NOTE: This game is in very early development. Everything you see is subject to change. Right now the only features in the game are randomly spawning enemies and the player.

You can press R to reset the gameroom to get new spawns.

Press Left click to shoot (you can hold it) and Right click to dash.

I'll try to update the game more! I know it looks very basic but the ideas I have for this will make it more than worth it!
